Contributor: Giles, Howard Everett, 1876-1955, artist.; John H. Eggers Co., printer.; United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation, publisher.;
Note: Signed "H. Giles." Initial "D" with a "P" in it, appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text says that nothing should stop you because nothing stops the men on the battlefield. Illustration shows the men fighting on the battlefield. The American flag is seen in the background.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Philadelphia, Pa. : United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Nothing stops these men
